snippet: President Obama needs to explain why limited military strikes against Syria would be effective.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Pres Obama's decision to seek Congressional authorization for unilateral military strikes against Syria; holds he must explain in greater detail why strikes would deter Pres Bashar al-Assad from repeated use of chemical weapons; contends Obama also needs to convince lawmakers that United States will not become mired in another prolonged military action.
lead_paragraph: President Obama needs to explain why limited military strikes against Syria would be effective.
